title: Amazon Labor Union Loses Election at Warehouse Near Albany
description: By a 2-to-1 ratio, the group had its second defeat since a surprise victory in April on Staten Island.
dc:creator: Karen Weise and Noam Scheiber
media:credit: DeSean McClinton-Holland for The New York Times
media:description: The vote at a facility in Castleton-on-Hudson, N.Y., was part of an effort by the Amazon Labor Union to expand its organizing efforts.
